document.full_text: the thoroughbred retirement foundation's primary benefactor said if the group wants to continue evaluating its herd of more than 1,000 horses, it must do so with its own money.
document.title: thoroughbred foundation loses financing for care evaluations
lines_and_colors: the thoroughbred retirement foundation's primary benefactor said if the group wants to continue evaluating its herd of more than 1,000 horses, it must do so with its own money.
